title: Club owner, bugged, halp.
body:
NOT SURE WHAT IS HAPPENING RN.
I own "QT Club" and have several members in the group with their tag still displaying, I, however, do not. Sad day. Please help.

replies.body: There was some [downtime ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016)with clubs over the last few weeks.  Clubs were recently restored but came along with some problems for a few clubs and its owners.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help you individually and figure out what's going on.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
